main event: A bright white light, estimated to be the size of a large aircraft, was observed crossing over two jet aircraft at a high altitude in the air space near St. George, Utah.
interesting points: The object was observed to be very high, estimated between 50,000 to 80,000 feet or closer.
The object crossed directly over the second of two jet aircraft that were in the area at the time of the sighting.
The witness, a doctor and pilot, was reported to be reliable, along with 10 other observers.
The weather conditions were excellent, with clear skies and good visibility.
No photographs or other physical evidence were obtained from the sighting.
sighted object: a bright white light, estimated to be the size of a large aircraft
location: 8 miles east of St. George, Utah
witnesses: a doctor and pilot, along with 10 other observers
